name: Ricardo van der Heijden
introduction: Ricardo has always been interested in technology and everything that has to do with computers and electronics. It is unnecessary to say that most of his hobbies involve technology and computing.

His core strengths include flexibility, determination, efficiency and good time management. He is a conscientious and independent worker, a fast learner and problem solver with strong analytical skills. He works well in a team too, always eager to learn from others and share his knowledge.
Project managers appreciate his dedication and focus on user experience, earnestly building applications that would benefit the user most.
